definition: a detriment or sacrifice, reduce the estimated value of something
details:
noun
- a detriment or sacrifice
= example: a detriment or sacrifice
- amounts paid for goods and services that may be currently tax deductible (as opposed to capital expenditures)
= synonyms: disbursement
- money spent to perform work and usually reimbursed by an employer
= example: money spent to perform work and usually reimbursed by an employer
verb
- reduce the estimated value of something
= synonyms: write off, write down
